DOC.brief_title: Nocipoint Therapy Versus Standard Physical Therapy Using Electrical Stimulation Treating Pain From TMJ Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: The prevalence temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) 20 % 60 % dental patient . Most patient suffer myofascial pain ( MFP ) subtype TMD . Analgesics , local muscle injection oral appliance often use treat TMD-related MFP . Patients also refer physical therapist frequently . Many physical therapy ( PT ) modality technique apply patient , include non-invasive transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) use TENS device . However , exact application TENS device , include location stimulation , duration intensity stimulation , largely decide physical therapist . Nocipoint Therapy , unique combination precise location , duration intensity TENS find substantially relieve general myofascial pain recover muscle function last effect . In preliminary observation clinical application , Nocipoint Therapy find rapidly substantially relieve TMD-related MFP within 2-3 session treatment . This clinical study compare effect Nocipoint Therapy TMD standard Physical therapy ( PT ) . TENS use control group part standard care ( i.e. , PT ) placebo .
